summary: the P H I L I P insta story,,,,,,do it
question: the P H I L I P insta story,,,,,,do it
answer:
i can’t decide if i love u or hate u but here we go (for context - x)

don’t imagine phil laid on the bed completely naked, head propped up against a pillow and dan starfished with his head at the other end, both sprawled out on the bed in whatever way allows their skin the most exposure to the too-warm air, allows their limbs not to touch. don’t imagine phil being immensely glad for a day at home, for a day to just rest after nearly a month of their tour, and don’t imagine him mildly annoyed that their flat’s just so damn hot.

don’t imagine they’d agreed to ignore the stagnant warmth though, because they’re only home for a bit and they’ve missed being in their bed, being with each other in a space that belongs to them (sort of). don’t imagine the sweat - far more than usual, even after their thin layers had been discarded - sticking the sheets to their skin, turning everything salty and shiny and do not imagine phil’s craving for sweets after his tongue has found its way across every inch of dan’s body.

don’t imagine phil staring up at the ceiling now, caught between being thoroughly fucked out and his body’s need to get up and feel any air moving against his skin. don’t imagine his compromise, rolling halfway over to the bedside table to grab his phone.

and don’t imagine dan’s little noise of protest when he notices said phone, his whiny, drawn-out phiillllll that only serves to make phil giggle at the screen. while they’re technically fine if he keeps the camera pointed at the ceiling, don’t imagine his finger coming to cover the lens anyway. just in case. 

don’t imagine phil’s hand slipping slightly on the phone as he presses record, rattling off an explanation and jumping right into the letters. to be fair, he should’ve expected the snacks and the cool-weather ones, but don’t imagine the way lover throws him for a loop - and don’t imagine the cheeky eyebrow wiggle dan gives him from where he’s still laid.

don’t imagine phil trying his best to hold it together cause there’s only two more letters and do not imagine dan’s face when he decides to say penis. for that matter, don’t imagine phil’s either: wide eyes, wide mouth, coughing out a laugh because it’s funny but he should probably at least pretend to be disappointed.

don’t imagine dan’s little what, you didn’t want me to say penis? right after phil’s stopped recording, and don’t imagine the fond eye roll phil gives him. and definitely don’t imagine the wink dan gives right back, exaggerated and prompting phil to poke his leg with a foot. 

don’t imagine them laying there a bit longer, just trying to work up the desire to properly move, because as much as they’d love to do nothing all day, they really don’t have the time. don’t imagine the thoughts already whirring in phil’s head, reminding him of this thing he’s got to pack and that email he has to send, because as much as they’d like to exist in the comfort of their home for a while, the tour’s only just gotten started.

don’t imagine it’s that thought that finally sets phil to moving, though, because of the way it sparks excitement in his chest - they’ve already been to so many incredible new places, and there are so many more to come, he suddenly feels like he wants to go see them all right now.

don’t imagine him rolling over, shoving at dan’s shoulder, telling him to get dressed already we have things to do! and don’t imagine dan’s response-by-way-of-groan. but he gets up anyway, tugs on the thinnest shirt and shorts he can find, and heads out of the room behind phil. because he’s just as excited as phil, but don’t imagine the little grin on his face at the idea that phil is who he gets to conquer the world with.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

body:
Conspiracy theory:

Dan’s “December video” will be the ii movie.


Thats why they keep saying it’ll be super accessible for everyone, and also why Dan’s not worried about uploading in the meantime.
